ovdesc.p: This application controls the production of messages, formats of messages, and deal slip formats, in the Fiduciary System.

The system generates pre-determined activity codes when an event takes place in the life of a contract. For each activity code an associated message and format can be produced if required, or can alternatively be suppressed. An optional deal slip can be produced in addition to, or instead of, an advice. The routing of the message generated is handled in the standard manner by the delivery system.
Messages are controlled at the level of Fiduciary Type, whether Order or Placement, and the activity code. An optional category code can also be specified if required.

Specifies which message type, if any is to be produced for the Activity.

desc.p: Description
The activity code with optional category used to form the unique key to the FD.ADVICES file.
The ID of the FD.ADVICES record is constructed as follows:

The system will check for the presence of a record with a specific category code and use that record before using the activity code. If no record is defined, no message will be produced, unless the activity code is 202 or 210, when the default is to produce the payment message.

p.p: "F" or "N" followed by "O" or "P" followed by 3 digit activity code followed by 5 digit category code.
